text:
Hey all. My team and I at <http://jobportraits.com|Job Portraits> are building <http://beforeyouapply.com|beforeyouapply.com>, a content-first job board.

We’re looking for a consultant or advisor to help us set up analytics on our platform. We’re exploring what metrics matter, which tools to use, how to implement, etc.

Our ideal partner for this project is someone who understands the recruiting space. But but but, the core of our product is content, so I think most folks in this group who are well-versed in metrics would be a fit here. We also need the similar assistance with metrics for the marketing pages on our website.

I’m the developer on the team. You’d work <https://www.linkedin.com/in/joncyoungii/|me> and our founder <https://www.linkedin.com/in/jacksonsolway/|Jackson> to get this spun up. Shoot me an email if you’re interested at <mailto:jon@beforeyouapply.com|jon@beforeyouapply.com>. Thanks and have a great weekend :woman-with-bunny-ears-partying:

attachments.title: Home – Job Portraits
attachments.text: Hi! We're a growing collective of startup people, corporate expats, and former journalists. We help companies big and small tackle creative challenges, mostly related to storytelling and company culture. We've partnered with fine folks at 90+ companies including Google, Eventbrite, and Instacart.
